room_title: Escape room "Hospital of Horror VR" by Escape Room 101 in Phoenix
room_description:
Walk the halls of an abandoned hospital - but watch out, you never know what's around the next corner.
Through the power of virtual reality, anything is possible.

You'll put on your VR headset and backpack and be transported to the Hospital of Horrors. You and your friends will walk around the abandoned rooms and ride the elevator, but watch out, you're not alone.
